blogs.title: Using a bot to navigate a website
blogs.summary: Have you ever needed some data from a website, but there's no public API available? Well today, web scraping is easier than ever and you can do it with just a few lines of code.

blogs.title: My React Dialogue Minigame
blogs.summary: On today's episode of overengineering, I'm making an interactive dialogue mini game in React. The setup: you're talking to my avatar and whenever he says something, you can choose your reply. Different replies lead the conversation in different paths, mimicing a real life conversation.
